species: Stella et al study: Drawdown rate starts at 10cm below soil surface ie 0 drawdown means water level remains 10cm below surface.
Amlin sapling study: water level started at 8cm below surface
Amlin seed study: water level maintained at 5cm below surface
*column F - divide by 15 to get the mean proportion surviving so it will be comparable to column E in the other study
